title: Saul Rescues Jabesh-Gilead
summary: 1 Samuel 11 describes Saul’s first major act as king—rescuing the city of Jabesh-Gilead from the Ammonites. He rallies Israel’s troops and defeats the enemy. His leadership is affirmed, and the people celebrate at Gilgal.

faq.question: Who was attacking Jabesh-Gilead?
faq.answer: Nahash the Ammonite, who threatened to gouge out the right eyes of the citizens.

faq.question: How did Saul respond?
faq.answer: He called the people together, led them to victory, and spared those who had doubted him earlier.
